Articles.Content: I'd love to see a second launchpad at KSC a little ways northeast of Launchpad 1, Connected to the VAB with the same crawlertracks.
I agree, some one NEEDS to make a KerbTown mod for that!
While it would be very cool, the only time I want to see NEEDS in caps is when discussing a ModuleManager :NEEDS[modName] block.
You might make a request in the "Kerbal Side" thread which is a mod that adds different launch sites using KerbTown.
